Module comp310_f21_hw08_comp310_f21_hw08_36
Package provided.rmiUtils

Class RMIPortConfigWithBoundName

java.lang.Object
provided.config.AppConfig
provided.rmiUtils.RMIPortConfig
provided.rmiUtils.RMIPortConfigWithBoundName
public class RMIPortConfigWithBoundName extends RMIPortConfig
An RMIPortConfig configuration that adds the storage of the Registry bound name associated with an app configuration. This type of configuration is useful when multiple simultaneous instances of an application all need to bind application-specific stubs into the Registry. The use of app instance-specific bound names keeps the app instances from conflicting with each other in the Registry. Use the bound name stored here to configure the discovery service model so that the proper endpoint for the app instance can be constructed. See the READ_ME.txt file in the provided.config package for example code illustrating how to use this and other AppConfig-derived classes.
Author:
swong

  • Constructor Details

    • RMIPortConfigWithBoundName

      public RMIPortConfigWithBoundName​(String name, int stubPort, int classServerPort, String boundName)
      Constructor for the configuration object
      Parameters:
      name - The name associated with this configuration. This is required by the AppConfigMap.AppConfig superclass.
      stubPort - The port to use for all RMI stubs in this configuration.
      classServerPort - The port the class file server uses in this configuration.
      boundName - The bound name to be used for the associated app instance's stub in the local Registry.
